verbs.description: [ARG0: A White House official] [V: dismissed] [ARG1: a view expressed by Sen. John McCain about President Donald Trump 's CIA nominee] , [ARGM-ADV: saying " it does n't matter " because] [ARGM-PRD: " he 's dying anyway] . "
